backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing a multi-token wallet backend with access control, transaction recording, contact management, user profiles, and balance tracking for five coin types (ICP, ckBTC, ckETH, ckSOL, infinityCoin).
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three completed features: USD portfolio value calculation in TotalAssetsDisplay, individual token USD values on dashboard, and removal of exchange rate implementation note.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including components, pages, hooks, utilities, and styling with details on authentication flow, token management, USD conversion, validation, and neon-themed UI design.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes using OKLCH color space, defining colors for UI elements like background, foreground, cards, borders, and charts.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with viewport meta tag, title 'Infinity Wallet', root div, and module script loading main.tsx.
frontend/SMOKE_TEST.md: Smoke test checklist covering seven test scenarios: connection flow, profile setup, dashboard render, navigation, send form with address validation, receive copy-to-clipboard, and contacts CRUD operations.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component managing Internet Identity authentication states (isInitializing, isLoggingIn, isLoginError), profile setup dialog, page routing between six pages, and error handling with loading and error UI states.
Authentication button component handling Internet Identity login/logout with loading states, query cache clearing on logout, and error recovery for duplicate authentication attempts.
frontend/src/components/auth/PrincipalDi: Displays the user's Internet Identity principal with optional truncation and a copy-to-clipboard button. Shows a styled card with the principal text and copy icon that changes to a checkmark on successful copy.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal dialog for first-time user profile setup that prompts for a name input. Cannot be dismissed and saves the profile using the useSaveCallerUserProfile mutation.
frontend/src/components/contacts/Contact: Dialog for adding or editing contacts with name and address fields. Validates recipient addresses and uses useSaveContact or useUpdateContact mutations depending on whether editing an existing contact.
frontend/src/components/errors/AppErrorB: React error boundary component that catches and displays application errors with a reload button. Shows error details in a collapsible section and provides a full-page error UI.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main application layout with header, navigation bar, and content area. Displays logo, auth button, principal, and navigation buttons for dashboard, receive, send, contacts, history, and contracts pages.
frontend/src/components/layout/WalletLog: Renders the wallet logo image with gradient overlay and app name text. Uses branding constants and applies futuristic styling with gradient text effects.
frontend/src/components/wallet/BalanceCa: Card component displaying token balance with icon, name, and optional USD value. Includes refresh button, loading skeletons, and error states.
frontend/src/components/wallet/BitcoinDe: Alert component that displays pending Bitcoin deposit status using useCkBtcDepositStatus hook. Shows only when there are pending deposits and includes a refresh button.
frontend/src/components/wallet/BitcoinFe: Alert component displaying Bitcoin network fee information in satoshis and BTC. Shows processing time estimate and explains the ckBTC burn and Bitcoin send process.
frontend/src/components/wallet/Recipient: Popover button with searchable contact list for selecting transaction recipients. Uses Command component for filtering and displays contact names with truncated addresses.
frontend/src/components/wallet/TotalAsse: Displays total wallet assets across multiple tokens (Infinity Coin, ICP, ckBTC, ckETH, ckSOL) with USD value calculation and denomination currency selector.
frontend/src/components/wallet/TransferM: Radio group component for selecting between wrapped ICRC-1 token transfers (fast, cheap) and native Bitcoin withdrawals (slower, network fees).
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor with identity-based authentication, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCkBtcBalance.ts: Fetches ckBTC balance from ICRC-1 ledger using authenticated identity with comprehensive debug logging for account construction and balance retrieval.
frontend/src/hooks/useCkBtcDepositAddres: Queries the ckBTC minter to get a Bitcoin deposit address for the authenticated user's principal, with mainnet-only error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useCkBtcDepositStatus: Polls ckBTC minter for pending Bitcoin deposit UTXOs and their confirmation status, parsing results into pending/confirmed/minted states.
frontend/src/hooks/useCkBtcLedger.ts: Creates and manages authenticated ckBTC ICRC-1 ledger client instance, initializing when identity is available with method verification logging.
frontend/src/hooks/useCkBtcMinter.ts: Creates and manages ckBTC minter client instance tied to authenticated identity for Bitcoin deposit/withdrawal operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useCkBtcMinterInfo.ts: Queries ckBTC minter for configuration info (fees, limits, etc.) with 5-minute cache staleness.
frontend/src/hooks/useCkBtcWithdraw.ts: Mutation hook for withdrawing ckBTC to native Bitcoin addresses via minter, invalidating balance and transaction queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useCkBtcWithdrawalSta: React Query hook that polls the ckBTC minter for withdrawal status by block index, refetching every 10 seconds until confirmed.
frontend/src/hooks/useCkEthBalance.ts: React Query hook that fetches ckETH balance from the ICRC-1 ledger with extensive console logging for debugging identity, account construction, and balance retrieval.
frontend/src/hooks/useCkEthLedger.ts: React hook that initializes and manages an authenticated ckETH ledger client, creating it when identity is available and logging initialization steps.
frontend/src/hooks/useCkSolBalance.ts: React Query hook that fetches ckSOL balance from the ICRC-1 ledger with comprehensive debugging logs for identity, account, and balance operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useCkSolLedger.ts: React hook that initializes and manages an authenticated ckSOL ledger client, verifying actor methods and logging the initialization process.
frontend/src/hooks/useExchangeRates.ts: React Query hook that fetches exchange rates for ICP, ckBTC, ckETH, ckSOL, and Infinity Coin from ICPSwap API, parsing USD pairs and caching for 60 seconds.
frontend/src/hooks/useIcpBalance.ts: React Query hook that fetches ICP balance from the ICRC-1 ledger with detailed console logging for debugging account construction and balance retrieval.
frontend/src/hooks/useIcpLedger.ts: React hook that initializes and manages an authenticated ICP ledger client, creating it when identity is available and verifying actor methods.
frontend/src/hooks/useInfinityCoinBalanc: React Query hook that fetches the Infinity Coin balance from the ICRC-1 ledger using the authenticated identity and ledger client, with extensive console logging for debugging balance fetch operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useInfinityLedger.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated Infinity Coin ledger client, initializing it when an identity is available and providing comprehensive debug logging of the client creation process.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and providing login/logout functionality using the @dfinity/auth-client.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for user profiles, transaction history, and contacts, providing CRUD operations that interact with the backend actor and manage cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color variables for light/dark cosmic theme, including neon cyan/purple/magenta accents and glow utilities for a space-themed UI.
frontend/src/lib/branding.ts: Exports constant strings for application name and supported token symbols (ICP, ckBTC, ckETH, ckSOL, Infinity Coin).
frontend/src/lib/ckBtcLedger/client.ts: Creates authenticated ICRC-1 ledger client for ckBTC with TypeScript types and IDL factory, providing methods for balance queries, transfers, and token metadata with debug logging.
frontend/src/lib/ckBtcLedger/config.ts: Exports the ckBTC ICRC-1 ledger canister ID constant as the single source of truth.
frontend/src/lib/ckBtcLedger/index.ts: Re-exports ckBTC ledger configuration, client creation functions, and TypeScript types from the ckBtcLedger module.
frontend/src/lib/ckBtcMinter/client.ts: Defines TypeScript types and IDL factory for the ckBTC minter canister, providing interfaces for Bitcoin address generation, balance updates, BTC retrieval, and minter info queries.
frontend/src/lib/ckBtcMinter/config.ts: Exports the official ckBTC minter canister ID for mainnet.
frontend/src/lib/ckBtcMinter/index.ts: Re-exports all configuration and client functionality from the ckBtcMinter module.
frontend/src/lib/ckEthLedger/client.ts: Implements ICRC-1 ledger client for ckETH with comprehensive debugging, providing balance queries, transfers, and metadata functions using the Dfinity agent.
frontend/src/lib/ckEthLedger/config.ts: Exports the ckETH ICRC-1 ledger canister ID as the single source of truth.
frontend/src/lib/ckEthLedger/index.ts: Re-exports ckETH ledger configuration, client factory, and all ICRC-1 types for external use.
frontend/src/lib/ckSolLedger/client.ts: Implements ICRC-1 ledger client for ckSOL with debugging support, mirroring ckETH client structure for balance, transfer, and metadata operations.
frontend/src/lib/ckSolLedger/config.ts: Exports the ckSOL ICRC-1 ledger canister ID as the single source of truth.
frontend/src/lib/ckSolLedger/index.ts: Re-exports ckSOL ledger configuration, client factory, and all ICRC-1 types for external use.
frontend/src/lib/icpAccountId.ts: Provides functions to derive ICP Ledger Account Identifiers from Principals using SHA-224 hashing and CRC32 checksums according to the standard derivation formula.
frontend/src/lib/icpLedger/client.ts: Implements ICRC-1 ledger client for ICP with debugging support, providing balance queries, transfers, fee queries, and metadata functions.
frontend/src/lib/icpLedger/config.ts: Exports the ICP ICRC-1 ledger canister ID as the single source of truth.
frontend/src/lib/icpLedger/index.ts: Re-exports ICP ledger configuration, client factory, and all ICRC-1 types for external use.
frontend/src/lib/infinityLedger/client.t: Defines ICRC-1 ledger client for Infinity Coin with types for accounts, transfers, and errors. Exports createInfinityLedgerClient function that creates an authenticated actor using @dfinity/agent with comprehensive debugging and IDL factory.
frontend/src/lib/infinityLedger/config.t: Exports the Infinity Coin ICRC-1 ledger canister ID constant (atuk3-uqaaa-aaaam-qduwa-cai) as the single source of truth.
frontend/src/lib/infinityLedger/index.ts: Re-exports all Infinity Coin ledger integration types and functions from config and client modules for convenient importing.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Provides utility functions: cn for merging Tailwind classes, truncatePrincipal for shortening principal strings, and formatTimestamp for converting bigint timestamps to readable dates.
frontend/src/lib/validation.ts: Contains validation functions for cryptocurrency addresses (ICP, Bitcoin, Ethereum, Solana) and amounts, plus utilities for parsing amounts to e8s format and formatting balances.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the root component with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/ContactsPage.tsx: Displays and manages saved contacts with add, edit, and delete functionality using custom hooks and shadcn/ui components with confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/ContractsPage.tsx: Provides UI for calling canister methods with Internet Identity authentication, including form inputs for canister ID, method name, and JSON arguments with simulated execution.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Main dashboard displaying total assets and individual token balances (Infinity Coin, ICP, ckBTC, ckETH, ckSOL) with USD values, Bitcoin deposit status, and navigation props.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Transaction history page that displays filtered transaction records with token icons, supports filtering by token type, and shows alerts about local vs on-chain transaction tracking.
frontend/src/pages/ReceivePage.tsx: Receive tokens page displaying the user's Principal address for ICRC-1 tokens and a native Bitcoin deposit address for ckBTC conversion with copy-to-clipboard functionality.
frontend/src/pages/SendPage.tsx: Send tokens page with multi-step form supporting wrapped (ICRC-1) and native transfers for multiple token types (Infinity Coin, ICP, ckBTC, ckETH, ckSOL) with validation, confirmation, and transaction recording.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage integration for parameter persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, extended shadows with glow effects, custom fonts (Inter, JetBrains Mono), and container settings.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file for Infinity Wallet showing pending feature requests to implement USD value display using ICP oracle/ICPSwap exchange rates for portfolio and individual token balances.
